response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Given its worth and the benefits it offers to you, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. We believe this offer presents a fantastic value for you, considering the product's actual market value of $8,000 to you. We look forward to hearing your response soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.", "product_price": 12000}
